title: clashcoder
description: Built a web platform for practicing algorithmic problems with user authentication, problem management, and submission tracking. Designed REST APIs for user management, submissions, and lobbies. Developed a Docker-based code judge worker to safely compile and run untrusted solutions in isolated containers. This project is similar to leetcode but it has a multiplayer lobby system

title: bizbridge
description: Built a web platform to connect investors and business owners, investors can search business owners based on business sectors and can message if interested, business owners can upload and showcase files as a way to legitimize their business. Developed both the backend and frontend, using websockets for chatting system for business owners and investors

title: Homecare-app
description: Developed a web app for elderly people to order homecare as an end of semester project
